Package game.core

Class Athlete

java.lang.Object
game.core.Athlete
public class Athlete extends Object
Athlete class for the game project. It represents an athlete in the game, with properties like name, offence, defence, stamina, position, price, injury status etc.

    • loseStamina

      public void loseStamina(int amount)
      Reduce the stamina of the athlete by the specified amount. If the stamina reaches zero, the athlete gets injured.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount of stamina to lose.

    • train

      public void train()
      Train the athlete, improving their offence and defence attributes, restoring stamina, removing any injury status, and increasing price.

    • useItem

      public void useItem(Items selectedItem)
      Use an item on the athlete, improving their attributes based on the item's effect.
      Parameters:
